posts.post_title: SOLD!!! NEW YEAR SPECIAL!!! T206 GEORGE STOVAL & BILL BRADLEY SGC 40 vg 3!
posts.post_content:

(2) Here is a SIMPLY OUTSTANDING example of the GEORGE STOVALL PORTRAIT version, 1st baseman for the CLEVELAND NAPS. Just added a BEAUTY in Geo. Stovall Portrait!
